channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-14686] Get unexpected command type when execute query "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ... AS"
item.description:
See the query: 

create table if not exists DST as select * from SRC;

if the table DST doesn't exist, SessionState.get().getHiveOperation() will return HiveOperation.CREATETABLE_AS_SELECT;
But if the table DST already exists, it will return HiveOperation.CREATETABLE;

It really makes some trouble for those who judge operation type by SessionState.get().getHiveOperation().

The reason I find out is that the function analyzeCreateTable in SemanticAnalyzer.java will return null and won't set the correct command type if the table already exists.

Here is the related code:

// check for existence of table
    if (ifNotExists) {
      try {
        Table table = getTable(qualifiedTabName, false);
        if (table != null) { // table exists
          return null;
        }
      } catch (HiveException e) {
        // should not occur since second parameter to getTableWithQN is false
        throw new IllegalStateException("Unxpected Exception thrown: " + e.getMessage(), e);
      }
    }
item.summary: Get unexpected command type when execute query "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ... AS"

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12826784 - PreCommit-HIVE-MASTER-Build

thank you for your reply ruili
I hava changed the code to the latest and the issue still exists.
Here is the debug info when execute the query. 

42a5ec91-6a86-4480-84fc-c892029b498f main[1] print queryState.getCommandType()
 queryState.getCommandType() = "CREATETABLE"

I hava update the patch.
Could you please review it again, thank you.

Thanks fanyunbojerry for the update. Seems some test failures are related. Can you take a look at that?
Besides, I think a more general solution is to set command type once the value of command_type is decided.

set command type once command_type decided;
change tests output files

ATTACHMENT ID: 12827337 - PreCommit-HIVE-MASTER-Build

ruili Agree with you and thanks for your advice.
I made a change:
set command type once the value of command_type decided;
change related tests output files.
And these failure tests seems not related.

Hi Yunbo, how about setting the command type after the for loop

for (int num = 1; num < numCh; num++)

Because in the loop we can hit errors like CTAS_CTLT_COEXISTENCE. So let's not change the original behaviour in that case. I guess it also means you don't have to set a default value.

ruili
I also thank so and I update the patch.
It's really nice of you to review it again.

Sorry if I wasn't being clear enough. I think we should set the cmd type after the for loop. For example, in the for loop we may firstly decide command_type is CTAS. But later we may also find CTLT so this is an error. In this case, we shouldn't modify the cmd type of the query state.

ruiliThanks for apply so quickly.
Sorry for misunderstanding.
Update again.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12827716 - PreCommit-HIVE-MASTER-Build

Thanks Yunbo for the update. Just a nit:

+    if (command_type == CREATE_TABLE || command_type == CTLT)
+        queryState.setCommandType(HiveOperation.CREATETABLE);
+    else if (command_type == CTAS)
+        queryState.setCommandType(HiveOperation.CREATETABLE_AS_SELECT);
+    else
+        throw new SemanticException("Unrecognized command.");

Please don't omit the braces of if statement.

ruili Thanks for your advice again.
The braces of if statement have been added.
